programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.sub-title: The Magic of the Flex Fuel Sensor
programme.desc: The ability to run a blend of gas and E85 is a game changer; credit the flex fuel sensor, which samples fuel composition and adjusts fuel flow, making more power as more E85 is mixed in.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: Do boost leaks really even matter? Can vacuum leaks make more power? You read those questions right. Come be surprised right along with us as we find power in unexpected places, and lose less than we'd expect in others.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek Bieri and Dave Chappelle find an old dually among a flock of chickens; with the goal of building this rig into a car-hauling shop truck, Derek sets his sights on major performance upgrades, while Dave gets to work on a custom suspension setup.

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten
programme.desc: The guys uncover a cop car racing series around the Ford Crown Victoria P71 Police Interceptor; with a handful of bolt-on upgrades, they turn their former police auction find into a road race ripper around Willow Springs.

programme.title: Runs Good
programme.desc: The team takes a short train ride to Santa Fe, New Mexico, to look at a Chevy Silverado 2500 that has an LS transplant; the previous owner wanted to turn it into a Sunday cruiser, but couldn't sort out why it would randomly shift into neutral.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.sub-title: Bel Air Big Block and Street Legal Restomod
programme.desc: A '57 Chevy looks great, but the guys discover that looks can be deceiving.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: This year's over-the-top build has Bill and crew lifting a 2020 Chevy Silverado 5500 more than a foot with a custom heavy-duty air suspension; the guys also prove their Texas mettle by radically overhauling the utility bed.

programme.title: Unique Rides
programme.desc: Team Unique puts the full-court press on basketball superstar Carmelo Anthony's Jeep Wrangler; Will forges a path to build his company's future.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A past client returns with a 1965 Mustang Fastback, and though he likes the stock look, he wants to upgrade the drivetrain, instrumentation and as many modern amenities as possible; the assembly team gets a crash course in engine tuning.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: An active-duty serviceman and his father are finally ready to finish their 1951 Ford pickup.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: The Martins face the challenge of trying to fit a 6'5" former football player into the cab of a 1967 Chevy C10, requiring customization of the firewall, motor, frame and interior.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Bill and his team make one of their longest custom chassis ever for a new 2020 Denali, and Ekstensive gets a diesel pro-mod drag car back on the track.

programme.title: Dirt Every Day
programme.sub-title: Colorado Crawling With Clampy and Maz-Grande
programme.desc: The guys are on the hunt for Colorado's finest four-wheeling trails.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Dave and Kev take the show to the Midwest, as more than 2,500 cars descend on the Summit Motorsports drag strip for a weekend of fun; Kev gets a ride in a lean, mean drag racing machine; Dave steps up his autocross game.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.desc: With updates well underway on custom car guru Joe Martin's prized '65 Pontiac Catalina, Joe and the boys at Martin Bros. Customs give the ol' choppy-doo to a '41 DeSoto that has seen better days.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: Truck builds tend to get bigger than originally planned, so it's no surprise when a 1971 Suburban goes even bigger with a custom lifted air suspension and interior; a nearly finished 2006 Kodiak needs just one more custom upgrade.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: A simple yet classy Pontiac Tempest arrives for a ground-up build, but things get complicated after the car is completely stripped.

programme.title: Iron Resurrection
programme.sub-title: Bel Air Big Block and Street Legal Restomod
programme.desc: A '57 Chevy looks great, but the guys discover that looks can be deceiving.
